It is characterized by its delicate, translucent leaves and small, pale flowers that bloom during the cooler months. The plant's unique morphology includes a short, squat stem and a cluster of narrow, waxy leaves that help it retain moisture in its arid habitat. Gothofreda brevipes is adapted to extreme environmental conditions, thriving in rocky, well-drained soils.
